Text:
Everyone please help me by seeding after you download. I want everyone to have these awesome programs, but I CANNOT seed them all by myself! I need YOUR help!

I have a very slow connection, and I can only seed with about 50KB/s UP

I will seed until someone hits 100%, then its up to you! If I see a torrent is dying I will seed it to keep it alive, but if you want me to upload more, I need to seed those, and the old ones have to be seeded by you!

THX!
